snippet.title: Elevator Invasion - Direct Gameplay Trailer (UNIS)
snippet.description:
https://arcadeheroes.com -   Here's the first look at an upcoming arcade exclusive light-gun shooter by UNIS by the name of Elevator Invasion. More details on this title will be published soon on the Arcade Heroes blog, but this gives you an idea of how it plays (along with the cheesy dialogue). This is not a remake/reboot/sequel to Taito's Elevator Action, but an original work; UNIS and Taito have worked out an arrangement regarding any similarities.

Launching to arcades in January 2021 and more will be seen at the UNIS showcase Event on Oct. 21st: https://uniselite.com/unis-showcase-2020/
